About How it works Mission Team Journey FAQ Join waitlist

Connecting people to support organizations.

CASE is a privacy-first mobile platform that securely connects people in urgent need with verified support organizations.

Join the waitlist See how it works
  • •
    Private-first chat conversation that creates an anonymized case instantly, preserving dignity and speeding help.
  • •
    Centralized directory of support organizations that span various sectors (welfare, education, legal, etc.).
  • •
    Consent-driven publicization to solicit donations.

Priority onboarding for beneficiaries and support organizations.

What is CASE?

The CASE platform is a centralized digital hub that connects individuals with a broad range of support organizations, making it easier for people to access the help they need. By bringing diverse support services together in one place, we remove the traditional barriers that hinder timely assistance.

Multi-platform:
Web, Android, IOS.

Coversation-based reporting.

Case management for support organizations.

Prioritizing community-building.

Privacy focused.

How it works

1

Search

Beneficiary looks for a support organization by using the search feature, the search is made easy by various search filters including organization category, location etc.

2

Get in touch

Beneficiary initates a chat with their preferred support organization, marking the start of their case.

3

Support

Support organization offer their services in order to resolve the case.

Our mission

Our mission is to connect vulnerable people to verified support organizations through a private-first, consent-driven platform that speeds relief, preserves dignity, and turns community goodwill into traceable support.

Frequently Asked Questions

Who should use CASE?

Anyone seeking help (food, shelter, legal aid, counseling, etc.) and verified support organizations that want to respond to those needs.

How do I get help?

You look for a support organization by using the search feature, the search is made easy by various search filters including organization category, location etc. You then initiate a chat with your preferred support organization, marking the start of your case.

How do donations work?

CASE does not process money, public stories include links to external donation pages so funds go directly to the organization named in the post.

Are organizations verified and how do I trust them?

Organizations go through lightweight verification during onboarding (documents, links, community references) and display availability and profile details so you can choose who to contact.

Contact:

Email: casebeheard@gmail.com • Partnerships: casebeheard@gmail.com

Join the waitlist Request partner access

CASE collects minimal data, supports anonymized reporting, and stores evidence only as required for follow-up.
